# ==(_:_:)

**Operator**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.

## Declaration

```swift
static func == (lhs: Pose3D, rhs: Pose3D) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **lhs**: The left-hand-side value.
- **rhs**: The right-hand-side value.

## Comparing values

- **isApproximatelyEqual(to:tolerance:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two poses are equal within a specified tolerance.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two poses are equal within a specified tolerance.
items.name: isApproximatelyEqual(to:tolerance:)
